document.full_text: the nhl-leading vancouver canucks continued its dominating form on friday, setting franchise records for points and road wins with a 3-1 victory over the atlanta thrashers.
document.title: vancouver canucks claim records after topping atlanta thrashers
lines_and_colors: the nhl-leading vancouver canucks continued its dominating form on friday, setting franchise records for points and road wins with a 3-1 victory over the atlanta thrashers.
